description: This file is a CMake script for finding and configuring the curl library, specifically checking for curl headers and library files, and setting up imported targets.

methods.name: find_path
methods.description: Searches for the specified header files for curl.

methods.name: find_library
methods.description: Searches for the curl library files.

methods.name: include
methods.description: Includes another CMake module, here including FindPackageHandleStandardArgs.

methods.name: find_package_handle_standard_args
methods.description: Handles standard argument processing for package configuration.

methods.name: mark_as_advanced
methods.description: Marks variables as advanced to hide them in GUI interfaces.

methods.name: set
methods.description: Sets variables for library and include directories.

methods.name: add_library
methods.description: Creates an imported library target for curl.

methods.name: set_target_properties
methods.description: Sets properties for the imported curl library target, such as location and include directories.
